Texts.Eng: +6% Chance to Freeze, Burn, or Electrify enemies on hit. These effects can stack.
110% Base Power while using a Wand in either hand without any other weapon equipped.
An upgrade to Spike Sphere, while transformed you regen slightly and are affected by low gravity. In addition, hold left click to create a barrier that pushes enemies away, draining energy to do so.

Broken Protectorate Broadsword.

Can equip the

Cannot use Ranged Weapons.
Cannot use Two-Handed Melee Weapons.

Press [F] to toggle. While active, damage taken also affects Energy, but half the Energy lost is converted to Health. You will die if the amount of Health gained back would not have been enough to live. While active; Energy cannot lock; and Energy recharges at 8% Max Energy per second, which increases with Int. and Vigor.

Press [G] (Bind [G] in your Controls) to teleport to your cursor (if possible). There is a slight cooldown before you can teleport again. Energy Cost depends on Distance and Agility. During Missions (and in your ship), Translocate is Line-of-Sight only!.
Press [Space] while in air to hover towards your cursor. The further your cursor, the faster you move. Your Energy drains while you hover. Hover speed scales with Agility.
While using Wands or Staves, gain +10% Fire, Electric, and Ice Resistance.
